video.title: Colony
video.synopsis: When LA is invaded by outside forces and becomes a walled-in settlement, a former FBI agent and his wife risk everything to find their lost son.

episodes.synopsis: In occupied Los Angeles, a former FBI agent attempts a risky smuggling operation and is later offered an unsavory job with a tempting payoff.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While Will adjusts to his new job and hunts the bomber, Katie secretly commits to the Resistance. Maddie reunites with a well-connected acquaintance.
episodes.title: A Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: Katie undertakes her first Resistance mission, with disturbing results, while Will's dogged pursuit of Geronimo threatens to expose the insurgents.
episodes.title: 98 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: After a bombing at their home, Phyllis questions Katie and Will. To procure insulin for Hudson, Maddie agrees to work for a profiteer art dealer.
episodes.title: Blind Spot

episodes.synopsis: Following a lead, Will and Beau look for Geronimo in the Green Zone, while Bram slips outside the wall and Katie comes under increased scrutiny.
episodes.title: Geronimo

episodes.synopsis: After Broussard leads a Resistance ambush of Snyder's motorcade, Snyder, fearing an administrative coup, holes up with Katie and Will at The Yonk.
episodes.title: Yoknapatawpha

episodes.synopsis: As Will hunts the disillusioned Broussard, Katie plots to keep both men on her side. Maddie becomes entangled in the Burgesses' exotic love life.
episodes.title: Broussard

episodes.synopsis: In exchange for a travel pass, Quayle makes a deal with Will to give up his cohorts, but Katie's response to the betrayal takes Will by surprise.
episodes.title: In from the Cold

episodes.synopsis: As riots erupt on the anniversary of the aliens' arrival, Will plans his family's escape and Katie plots with Eckhart to kidnap the regional Host.
episodes.title: Zero Day

episodes.synopsis: At their hideout, the insurgents scramble to examine The Host's body, while Will and Maddie race to protect loved ones in the wake of a crackdown.
episodes.title: Gateway

episodes.synopsis: As the city deteriorates, Will and Katie struggle to keep their family together. Snyder gets a mysterious job offer. Broussard returns home.
episodes.title: Eleven.Thirteen

episodes.synopsis: Katie is disheartened to discover that Bram's been moved out of the zone. Will and Devon team up in Santa Monica to find Charlie.
episodes.title: Somewhere Out There

episodes.synopsis: Devon joins Will and Charlie on their return journey home. Bram is rudely awakened to the realities of life in a labor camp.
episodes.title: Sublimation

episodes.synopsis: Will and Katie encounter complex challenges while helping Charlie deal with his scars. Jennifer faces a difficult choice.
episodes.title: Panopticon

episodes.synopsis: Will returns to his workplace and finds the atmosphere rife with suspicion, paranoia and fear. Snyder gives Bram an assignment.
episodes.title: Company Man

episodes.synopsis: Will tries to use his work computer to open a file that might have information on Bram. Nolan and Maddie pay a visit to the labor camp.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Bram joins some of his fellow prisoners in a risky mission. Will and his partner are assigned to investigate a suicide bombing.
episodes.title: Free Radicals

episodes.synopsis: Katie works with the resistance to save a fugitive from the occupation. At the labor camp, Snyder gives Bram a difficult choice.
episodes.title: Good Intentions

episodes.synopsis: Will and Katie search for the pilot of an airplane that was shot down by drones. Bob succeeds in making a case for investigating the Bowmans.
episodes.title: Tamam Shud

episodes.synopsis: Katie makes a secret visit to Maddie to warn her that the authorities might come for her. Will, Katie and Broussard plot to leave the colony.
episodes.title: The Garden of Beasts

episodes.synopsis: When there's an armed attack on the Green Zone, the story of the violent assault is told from several different points of view.
episodes.title: Lost Boy

episodes.synopsis: Will and Broussard make an offer to the leader of the Red Hand. Nolan's relationship with Maddie continues to be a political liability for him.
episodes.title: Seppuku

episodes.synopsis: Snyder tells Will of the Hosts' plans for the colony. The revelation forces the Bowman family to make an impossible choice.
episodes.title: Ronin

episodes.synopsis: During their seclusion, the Bowmans and Snyder witness a crash that threatens their safety but also leads to a revelation about the Hosts.
episodes.title: Maquis

episodes.synopsis: As Broussard pieces together the truth behind the state of Los Angeles, the Bowmans consider taking a train ride to contact the Resistance.
episodes.title: Puzzle Man

episodes.synopsis: While Will assesses the safety of their new location, Katie conducts her own investigation. Broussard and dispatcher Amy Leonard make a discovery.
episodes.title: Sierra Maestra

episodes.synopsis: Will and Katie debate with the leader of their new refuge while Broussard questions Amy's intentions after carrying out a risky plan.
episodes.title: Hospitium

episodes.synopsis: The Bowmans must withstand a tough interrogation as Snyder attempts to plant doubt in the mind of an influential soldier at their current location.
episodes.title: End of the Road

episodes.synopsis: Danger follows the Bowmans when they search for a safe space. Meanwhile, Snyder receives an opportunity while attempting to settle into his new life.
episodes.title: The Emerald City

episodes.synopsis: Under fresh identities, Will conducts a side investigation as Katie helps a desperate family. Bram prepares a backup plan for himself.
episodes.title: A Clean, Well-Lighted Place

episodes.synopsis: Katie treads on shaky ground as Will joins a mission. Back in the mix, Snyder learns a secret from Seattle's governor, Everett Kynes.
episodes.title: Lazarus

episodes.synopsis: Broussard searches for information while Will seeks payback when they plot an ambush that raises serious concerns for Amy.
episodes.title: The Big Empty

episodes.synopsis: Ending a stalemate, Will finally comes clean to Katie. Meanwhile, Snyder probes for incriminating evidence against Kynes.
episodes.title: Sea Spray

episodes.synopsis: Katie and Will consider forming an alliance with unexpected allies for their survival. Snyder makes a bold move to assert his influence.
episodes.title: Disposable Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Will and Broussard lead a race against Snyder to track down Kynes, which puts the Bowman family at a crossroads.
episodes.title: Bonzo

episodes.synopsis: When Seattle faces its biggest threat, the Bowmans must make several major decisions that will have a permanent impact on their family.
episodes.title: What Goes Around
